attributes.action: have Boris Johnson resign as prime minister.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to have Boris Johnson to resign as prime minister. he is putting the public at risk. his motive is to think about money and the economy more than public health.

he has failed us regarding COVID-19 outbreak. we need someone else in power that willing to put the uk public first before more people fall ill and die....

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
